title: Item sets
body:
I had to double-take this morning. Reading the patch notes, and there tucked humbly away at the bottom was Items sets, I was halfway through reading the next point when it clicked.
 
Not only that, but all your old items sets have been saved and automatically introduced in the new item set maker.

Thank you!

replies.body:
I clicked on this thinking it would be more complaining about the lack of item sets, but then it turned out *positive*.

:D

> [{quoted}](name=Percival9,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VRvex01B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-01T01:36:00.129+0000)
>
> I clicked on this thinking it would be more complaining about the lack of item sets, but then it turned out *positive*.
> 
> :D

Same. Now I have to complain about something else.

Honestly, why do we even need item sets? It's not like theirs a large variety of items that you can use. All champions build the same things, no matter what. Sick balance on that, by the way. Also, why add a useless feature onto the already buggy and trash client? The new client has so many issues that should be fixed rather than adding a feature that 0.5% of people will use.

Better yet, why not fix the damn item list in-game and place 'Ability power' at the top of the magic list where it should be. It's been out of order for ages and this triggers me. Better yet, again, why not fix the entire in-game shop so it doesn't look like it was made for a MUD? Jesus.
Whooo Item sets....I never really used them but I can see their usefulness. I like that in the new one it gives you recently played champions to create one for, might create a few later today.

Hey Marauder, why doesn't the the new item sets let you click on the items in the set to bring up the build path? It's these types of obvious oversights that Riot misses that gets people (at least I) annoyed.
actually it has that feature. Double click and item and it'll bring up the build path and combine costs. I discovered this when trying to select jungle items.
Yeah thanks Riot, it's a great feature and even easier to use than the ones in the old client. Good job!
